productInfo.youCanText: Print as many times as you want at home or at print shops and assemble for personal use or as a gift. Add phrases.
productInfo.youCannotText: Share on any social media, email, plagiarize, modify the art, exchange, lend, resell or commercialize the file (digital or printed).
productInfo.practicalityText: Files are released and sent instantly after payment confirmation to your email and to your account created here on the website. No need to send proof of payment to the seller.
productInfo.attentionText: You need to download and save to the Google Drive app as technologies are unpredictable. I am not responsible for file loss.
productInfo.copyrightLaw: This file is protected by LAW No. 9,610, OF FEBRUARY 19, 1998. The crime of copyright violation is provided for in art. 184 of the Penal Code, which states: "Violate copyright and related rights: Penalty - detention, from 3 months to 1 year, or fine".

federalLaw.title: Federal Copyright Law
federalLaw.description: A Rafa Criou is protected by Federal Copyright Law (Law No. 9.610, 02/1998). This covers the possibility of publishing trademarks, arts and any material created by the store without prior notice. Through the same law, copying and/or total or partial disclosure of materials developed by the store without authorization for commercial use is characterized as a crime.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Use
prohibited.description: It is not permitted to distribute, donate, transfer, resell, sub-license or share any of our original or modified products in digital form.

declaration.title: Important Declaration
declaration.description1: A Rafa Criou DOES NOT USE in any way any material from the Watchtower association, which has its domain JW.ORG, and our files mainly images are 100% original or AI-generated.
declaration.description2: We are fully aware that using any material from the association is wrong and a crime.

piracy.title: Piracy is a Crime!
piracy.description: And we do not agree with such acts.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.description: In case of accusation to the store of committing crimes against the Watchtower association, your message can and will be used as judicial evidence for moral damages that will involve the law of crimes against honor: slander, defamation or insult.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: We are a 100% online store that develops theocratic digital files to be printed and used for personal use.

objective.title: Our Objective
objective.description: Our objective is to provide quality files for you to give as gifts to relatives, brothers and friends with much love and biblical-based files.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: In October 2023, we started making our first digital files. The idea came as a hobby and with no experience, and gradually our work evolved.
story.description2: We studied ways to improve and today we already work professionally.

products.title: Our Products
products.description1: We have files for various occasions.
products.description2: With much love we do our work to give as gifts on any occasion and we want our keepsakes to be received and kept with much love, both by those who received them and those who gave them.

warning.title: IMPORTANT
warning.noRefunds: CANCELLATION WITH REFUND IS NOT POSSIBLE.

legal.notApplicable: does not apply to digital products
legal.mistakePurchases: as well as it applies to purchases made by mistake.
legal.noRefundDigital: Refunds are not made for digital products
legal.noRealReturn: as there is no actual return of the product. The same applies to exchanges.

intro.p1: Our commitment is to the integrity and security of our users' and customers' personal data. This Privacy Policy applies to all digital interactions on our website, associated services, mobile applications, and other digital platforms under our control.
intro.p2: By accessing and using our platforms, you acknowledge and agree to the practices described in this policy. We treat the protection of your personal data with the utmost seriousness and commit to processing it responsibly, transparently, and securely.

sections.dataCollected: Data Collected and Reasons for Collection
sections.cookies: Use of Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.sharing: Sharing and Transfer of Personal Data
sections.externalLinks: Links to other websites and social networks

definitions.personalData: is information that identifies or can identify a natural person.
definitions.sensitiveData: is information that reveals intimate personal characteristics, such as racial origin, religious beliefs, political opinions, genetic or biometric data.
definitions.processing: encompasses any operation with Personal Data, such as collection, recording, storage, use, sharing, or destruction.
definitions.laws: are all laws that regulate Personal Data Processing, including GDPR and other applicable regulations.

dataCollected.intro: We collect and process the following types of personal data:
dataCollected.providedText: This includes, but is not limited to, name, surname, email address, physical address, payment information, and any other information you choose to provide when creating an account, making a purchase, or interacting with our customer service.
dataCollected.automaticText: When you visit our website, we automatically collect information about your device and your interaction with our site. This may include data such as your IP address, browser type, device details, time zone, pages visited, products viewed, websites or search terms that directed you to our site, and information about how you interact with our site.

cookies.intro: We use cookies, which are small text files stored on your device, and other tracking technologies to improve user experience on our website, understand how our services are used, and optimize our marketing strategies.
cookies.essentialText: Essential for the website's functioning, allowing you to navigate and use its features. Without these cookies, services such as shopping cart and payment processing cannot be provided.
cookies.performanceText: Collect information about how visitors use our website, which pages are visited most frequently, and if they receive error messages. These cookies are only used to improve performance and user experience on the site.
cookies.functionalityText: Allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language, or region) and provide enhanced and more personalized features.
cookies.advertisingText: Used to offer ads more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an ad, as well as help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

purposes.intro: The collected data is used to:

items.provide: Provide, operate, and improve our services and offerings
items.process: Process your transactions and send notifications related to your purchases
items.personalize: Personalize your user experience and recommend content or products
items.communicate: Communicate important information, offers, and promotions
items.analyze: Conduct internal analyses to develop and improve our services
items.comply: Comply with applicable legal and regulatory obligations

sharing.intro: We may share your personal data with third parties in the following circumstances:
sharing.serviceProviders: With service providers and partners who assist us in business operations, provided they act in accordance with our data protection guidelines and applicable legislation;
sharing.legal: To comply with legal obligations, respond to legal processes, or protect our rights and properties, as well as the safety of our customers and the public;
sharing.corporate: In case of corporate restructuring, sale, merger, or other asset transfer, ensuring that the receiving entity agrees to respect the privacy of your data according to a policy equivalent to ours.

externalLinks.p1: Our platform may include links to external websites of partners, advertisers, and suppliers. Clicking these links means you will be redirected outside our website, entering domains that follow their own privacy policies, for which we are not responsible.
externalLinks.p2: We recommend carefully reading these policies before providing any personal data. Likewise, we do not assume responsibility for the privacy practices of third parties such as Facebook, Apple, Google, and Microsoft. We advise you to inform yourself about the privacy policies of these entities when using their services or applications.

rights.intro: You have various rights regarding your personal data, including:
rights.access: The right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data in our possession;
rights.limit: The right to limit or object to our processing of your data;
rights.withdraw: The right to withdraw your consent at any time, when processing is based on consent.
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at

security.text: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, it is important to note that no system is completely secure. We commit to notifying you and any applicable authority of any security breaches in accordance with applicable legislation.

changes.text: Our Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. The most current version will always be published on our website, indicating the date of the last revision. We encourage you to regularly review our policy to stay informed about how we are protecting your data.

contactSection.text: If you have questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or data practices, please do not hesitate to contact us at
contactSection.commitment: We are committed to resolving any issues related to the privacy of our users and customers.
